subject: Track and Field
Records and Achievements
Longevity
lead_paragraph: At the San Diego Senior Olympics on Sunday, Don Pellmann broke five records for men in the 100-and-over age group and tried to become the oldest man to record a height in the pole vault.
snippet: At the San Diego Senior Olympics on Sunday, Don Pellmann broke five records for men in the 100-and-over age group and tried to become the oldest man to record a height in the pole vault.
